document.full_text: g8 leaders promised on friday to support new arab democracies, according to a statement they are to release from a meeting in the northern french resort town of deauville.
document.title: g8 pledges financial help for "arab spring" nations
lines_and_colors: g8 leaders promised on friday to support new arab democracies, according to a statement they are to release from a meeting in the northern french resort town of deauville.
